amendment.description: Amendment requires that both parents, or a child's legal guardian, must execute an application before a passport is issued for the first time to a child under the age of 14.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 18, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 to require that both parents, or the child's legal guardian, must execute the passport application before it is issued for the first time to children under the age of 14.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibbons amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 3 (Roll no. 323).
